message.body: Hey Dan, sorry last night didn't come together. I hate having to cancel things last minute. Hopefully, we can reschedule in the next week or two.
No problem. I am available whenever. You guys usually just rehearse Mondays?

Yeah, we practice on Mondays, if everyone is available. I told them that I would like to practice both 7/1 and 7/8. I'm waiting to hear back on those two dates. So, hopefully, we can meet up on one of those nights.
No problem. Have you had any new ideas since we last talked?
Nothing significant, but I'll keep working on it.
but, i do have a rough idea in my head how the whole thing could go.
OK are we shooting all outside or some in studio as well
This one, I think, can be all on location; however, I'm hoping to do videos for all 3 songs that we recorded. So, I will want to do the studio thing again at some point.
Will there be instruments in this one?
